article_text:
Liberals insist the stagnation of real incomes in the Obama era can be solved with more redistribution, while the Donald Trump right focuses on immigrants and trade. Maybe the better explanation is this era’s onslaught of lousy economic policies, starting with ObamaCare.

Among the law’s few popular features, even among Republicans, is the mandate to cover adult children through age 26 on the insurance plans of their parents. This benediction is sold as a gratuity, but somebody must ultimately pay, and new research...

twitter.description: The cost of insuring your 26-year-old is more than you thought, the Wall Street Journal writes in an editorial.
twitter.title: ObamaCare’s $1,200 Pay Cut

article_summary:
This benediction is sold as a gratuity, but somebody must ultimately pay, and new research...
Liberals insist the stagnation of real incomes in the Obama era can be solved with more redistribution, while the Donald Trump right focuses on immigrants and trade.
Maybe the better explanation is this era’s onslaught of lousy economic policies, starting with ObamaCare.
Among the law’s few popular features, even among Republicans, is the mandate to cover adult children through age 26 on the insurance plans of their parents.
